name: The Interview - Chapter One
description:
The Interview is a very sexy kinetic novel, made with the popular Ren'Py engine.
The story unfolds in front of you while you are playing the game, and you will be able to influence some aspects of the game's scenes.

You will be following the lives of Angela and Bibi, who are about to have an interview with a fashion photographer, which may get them an incredible opportunity to model a new fashion line for a world renowned clothing producer. A lot is at stake for them to get that job!
But, things don't always turn out the way we'd like them to, and the girls will have to face making tough decisions and dealing with the consequences of those.

Follow Angela and Bibi on their adventure, which will lead them into a world of lust and sexual depravity.
Will their boyfriends be able to ultimately save them from this fate? Well, find out!

We are the producers of the world's best commercially available adult animations for DAZ Studio to create photorealistic renders, and we've been using them throughout our game. Visual and audible immersion throughout the game is key to us.
